Teacher: Ms. Wilson has been a teacher both inside and outside of the classroom throughout my time at New Hampton. Over my four years I had here for a total of five terms in photography, animation, Flej, and IB Art. Perhaps more impressively though, she helped me plan not one but two project week trips. Thank you for all you did for me and all you do for others.
